notes: This creature was removed from the game, It was a part of [[Tibia's 10th Anniversary]], it might come in other holiday events.
sounds: I had Princess Lumelia as breakfast
My brother will come and get you for this!
My dragon is not that old, it's just second hand.
My other dragon is a red one.
When I am big I want to become the ruthless eighth.
name: Minishabaal
behaviour: Can spam his attacks very fast.
location: North of [[Darashia]] while Demonic Raid is active.
strategy: Either try to trap it or try to get many SDers to combo it down at low life before it runs away.
